description: CSS file defining the styles and themes for the App component, including light and dark themes, responsive design, and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container styling with theme colors and layout properties.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application's logo, including animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header section of the application with background and layout properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application with transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including its position, background color, and hover effects.
